solution_line_template: They'll celebrate their {anniversary_duration}th wedding anniversary in {anniversary_year} which means they got married in {anniversary_year}-{anniversary_duration} = <<{anniversary_year}-{anniversary_duration}={marriage_year}>>{marriage_year}

They started dating {dating_before_marriage_years} years before they got married in {marriage_year} which means they started dating in {marriage_year}-{dating_before_marriage_years} = {dating_start_year}
And they met {met_before_dating_years} years before they started dating which means they met in {dating_start_year}-{met_before_dating_years} = {meeting_year}
